AavePoolGetReserveNormalizedIncomeReturn.details: getReserveNormalizedIncome() returned zero for underlying asset. Oracle only supports active Aave-V2 assets.

CanOnlyTradeIfUnlocked(bool).details: Error which ensures the VAMM is unlocked

ExpectedOppositeSigns(int256,int256).details: The two values were expected to have oppostite sigs, but do not

ExpectedSqrtPriceZeroBeforeInit(uint160).details: Error which is reverted if the sqrt price of the vamm is non-zero before a vamm is initialized

IRSNotionalAmountSpecifiedMustBeNonZero(.details: Error which ensures the amount of notional specified when initiating an IRS contract (via the swap function in the vamm) is non-zero

LiquidityDeltaMustBePositiveInBurn(uint1.details: Error which ensures the liquidity delta is positive if a given LP wishes to burn liquidity in the vamm

LiquidityDeltaMustBePositiveInMint(uint1.details: Error which ensures the liquidity delta is positive if a given LP wishes to mint further liquidity in the vamm

MarginLessThanMinimum(int256).details: Cannot have less margin than the minimum requirement

NotEnoughFunds(uint256,uint256).details: There are not enough funds available for the requested operation

OnlyMarginEngine().details: only the margin engine can run a certain function

PositionNetZero().details: No need to unwind a net zero position

PositionNotSettled().details: Position must be settled after AMM has reached maturity

WithdrawalExceedsCurrentMargin().details: We can't withdraw more margin than we have

initialize(address,address).details: in the initialize function we set the vamm and the margiEngine associated with the fcm

params.notional: Notional that cover by a fully collateralised fixed taker interest rate swap
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: The binary fixed point math representation of the sqrtPriceLimit beyond which the fixed taker swap will not be executed with the VAMM

returns._0: marginEngine Margine Engine linked to the Full Collateralisation Module

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

returns._0: Rate Oracle linked to the Full Collateralisation Module

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settleTrader().details: This function lets us settle a fully collateralised fixed taker position post term end timestamp of the MarginEnginethe settlement cashflow is calculated by invoking the calculateSettlementCashflow function of FixedAndVariableMath.sol (based on the fixed and variable token balance)if the settlement cashflow of the trader is positive, then the settleTrader() function invokes the transferMarginToFCMTrader function of the MarginEngine which transfers the settlement cashflow the trader in terms of the underlying tokensif settlement cashflow of the trader is negative, we need to update trader's margin in terms of scaled yield bearing tokens to account the settlement casflowonce settlement cashflows are accounted for, we safeTransfer the scaled yield bearing tokens in the margin account of the trader back to their wallet address

transferMarginToMarginEngineTrader(addre.details: in case of aave this is done by withdrawing aTokens from the aaveLendingPools resulting in burning of the aTokens in exchange for the ability to transfer underlying tokens to the margin engine trader

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.notionalToUnwind: The amount of notional to unwind (stop securing with a fixed rate)
params.sqrtPriceLimitX96: The sqrt price limit (binary fixed point notation) beyond which the unwind cannot progress

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

returns._0: VAMM linked to the Full Collateralisation Module

CannotLiquidate(uint256).notice: The position/trader needs to be below the liquidation threshold to be liquidated

CannotSettleBeforeMaturity().notice: Positions and Traders cannot be settled before the applicable interest rate swap has matured

InvalidMarginDelta().notice: Margin delta must not equal zero

MarginRequirementNotMet(int256,int24,int.notice: The resulting margin does not meet minimum requirements

MarginRequirementNotMetFCM(int256).notice: The resulting margin does not meet minimum requirements

OnlyOwnerCanUpdatePosition().notice: Only the position/trade owner can update the LP/Trader margin

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntOverflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntUnderflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format underflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when the intermediary absolute result overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathUD60x18__FromUintOverflow(uint256.notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format format overflows UD60x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

initiateFullyCollateralisedFixedTakerSwa.notice: Initiate a Fully Collateralised Fixed Taker Swap

marginEngine().notice: Margine Engine linked to the Full Collateralisation Module

rateOracle().notice: Rate Oracle linked to the Full Collateralisation Module

transferMarginToMarginEngineTrader(addre.notice: Transfer Margin (in underlying tokens) from the FCM to a MarginEngine trader

unwindFullyCollateralisedFixedTakerSwap(.notice: Unwind Fully Collateralised Fixed Taker Swap

vamm().notice: VAMM linked to the Full Collateralisation Module
